# Data Documentation
The link to the original data source: [Kaggle UberEats Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/ahmedshahriarsakib/uber-eats-usa-restaurants-menus/)

## Variables
* id (Restaurant id)
* position (Restaurant position in UberEats search result)
* name.y (Restaurant name)
* name.x (Menu meal name)
* score (Restaurant score)
* ratings (Ratings count)
* category (Restaurant category)
* avgprice (Average price by restaurant)
* morethanavg (Price more than $12.60)
* popular (Position greater than or less than 30)
* avgscoreinarea (Average score by zip code )
* zip_code (Zip code)
* lat (Latitude)
* lng (Longitude)
* category (Menu category)
* name (Menu Name)
* description (Menu description)
* price (Menu price)
